Title: Relates to the appointment of impartial hearing officers to hear appeals of determinations regarding children with handicapping conditions
Summary: Prohibits the appointment of certain state, municipal or agency employees as impartial hearing officers to hear appeals of determinations regarding children with handicapping conditions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the appointment of impartial hearing officers to hear appeals of determinations regarding children with handicapping conditions
